```{=html}
<html lang="en">
  <head>
    <meta charset="utf-8" />
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1" />
    <meta name="description" content="Mulimbika Makina - Data Analyst and MSc Mathematics (Data Science) Student" />
    <meta name="author" content="Mulimbika Makina" />
    <link rel="icon" type="image/x-icon" href="assets/favicon.ico" />
    <link rel="preconnect" href="https://fonts.googleapis.com" />
    <link rel="preconnect" href="https://fonts.gstatic.com" crossorigin />
    <link href="https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=Plus+Jakarta+Sans:wght@400;700;900&display=swap" rel="stylesheet" />
    <link href="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/bootstrap@5.3.0/dist/css/bootstrap.min.css" rel="stylesheet" />
    <link href="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/bootstrap-icons@1.10.5/font/bootstrap-icons.css" rel="stylesheet" />

    <style>
      body {
        font-family: 'Plus Jakarta Sans', sans-serif;
      }

      main {
        padding: 0;
        margin: 0;
      }

      /* Fully-rounded badge-style tabs */
      .custom-badge {
        background: linear-gradient(to right, #2e2eff, #ec2aa7);
        color: white;
        font-weight: 700;
        padding: 10px 24px;
        border-radius: 999px;
        font-size: 1rem;
        box-shadow: 0 4px 8px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.2);
        text-align: center;
        white-space: nowrap;
        transition: all 0.3s ease;
        border: none;
        margin: 8px;
        flex-shrink: 0;
      }

      .custom-badge:hover,
      .custom-badge.active {
        background: linear-gradient(to right, #2563eb, #d946ef);
        transform: scale(1.05);
        box-shadow: 0 6px 18px rgba(37, 99, 235, 0.3);
      }

      .tab-scroll-wrapper {
        display: flex;
        align-items: center;
        justify-content: center;
        position: relative;
        margin: 20px 0;
        overflow: hidden;
      }

      .tab-buttons {
        display: flex;
        gap: 16px;
        overflow-x: auto;
        padding: 0 10px;
        flex-grow: 1;
        scroll-behavior: smooth;
      }

      .tab-buttons::-webkit-scrollbar {
        display: none;
      }

      .scroll-arrow {
        background: none;
        border: none;
        font-size: 1.8rem;
        font-weight: bold;
        color: #333;
        cursor: pointer;
        padding: 0 10px;
        display: none;
      }

      @media (max-width: 768px) {
        .scroll-arrow {
          display: block;
        }

        .left-arrow {
          margin-right: 5px;
        }

        .right-arrow {
          margin-left: 5px;
        }
      }

      .tab-content {
        width: 100%;
        padding: 0;
        margin: 0;
      }

      .tab-pane {
        width: 100%;
        text-align: left;
        padding: 30px;
        box-sizing: border-box;
        display: none;
      }

      .tab-pane.active {
        display: block;
        border: 1px solid #ddd;
        background-color: #fff;
        margin: 0 30px;
        border-radius: 6px;
        box-shadow: 0 2px 6px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.04);
      }

      @media (max-width: 768px) {
        .tab-pane.active {
          margin: 0 15px;
          padding: 20px;
        }
      }
    </style>
  </head>

  <body class="bg-light">
    <main>
      <!-- Scrollable tabs with arrows -->
      <div class="tab-scroll-wrapper">
        <button class="scroll-arrow left-arrow" aria-label="Scroll left">&laquo;</button>
        <div class="tab-buttons" id="tabScroll">
          <button class="custom-badge active" data-target="experience">Experience</button>
          <button class="custom-badge" data-target="download">Download Resume</button>
          <button class="custom-badge" data-target="education">Education</button>
          <button class="custom-badge" data-target="skills">Technical Skills</button>
        </div>
        <button class="scroll-arrow right-arrow" aria-label="Scroll right">&raquo;</button>
      </div>

      <!-- Content panes -->
      <div class="tab-content">
        <div id="experience" class="tab-pane active">
          <p>Experience content here...</p>
        </div>
        <div id="download" class="tab-pane">
          <a class="btn btn-primary px-4 py-3" href="assets/Mulimbika_Makina_CV.pdf" download>
            <i class="bi bi-download me-2"></i>Download Resume
          </a>
        </div>
        <div id="education" class="tab-pane">
          <p>Education content here...</p>
        </div>
        <div id="skills" class="tab-pane">
          <p>Technical Skills content here...</p>
        </div>
      </div>
    </main>

    <!-- Tab switching + arrow logic -->
    <script>
      const buttons = document.querySelectorAll('.custom-badge');
      const panes = document.querySelectorAll('.tab-pane');
      const tabScroll = document.getElementById('tabScroll');
      const leftArrow = document.querySelector('.left-arrow');
      const rightArrow = document.querySelector('.right-arrow');

      // Tab switching logic
      buttons.forEach(button => {
        button.addEventListener('click', () => {
          buttons.forEach(btn => btn.classList.remove('active'));
          panes.forEach(pane => pane.classList.remove('active'));

          button.classList.add('active');
          document.getElementById(button.dataset.target).classList.add('active');
        });
      });

      // Arrow scroll controls
      function updateArrowVisibility() {
        const scrollLeft = tabScroll.scrollLeft;
        const scrollWidth = tabScroll.scrollWidth;
        const clientWidth = tabScroll.clientWidth;

        // Hide/show arrows based on position
        leftArrow.style.display = scrollLeft <= 0 ? 'none' : 'block';
        rightArrow.style.display = scrollLeft + clientWidth >= scrollWidth - 1 ? 'none' : 'block';
      }

      leftArrow.addEventListener('click', () => {
        tabScroll.scrollBy({ left: -150, behavior: 'smooth' });
      });

      rightArrow.addEventListener('click', () => {
        tabScroll.scrollBy({ left: 150, behavior: 'smooth' });
      });

      tabScroll.addEventListener('scroll', updateArrowVisibility);
      window.addEventListener('load', updateArrowVisibility);
      window.addEventListener('resize', updateArrowVisibility);
    </script>
  </body>
</html>


```
